welcome_message: Hello! I am an AI News Bot. Ready to serve you the latest summarized news.
help_message:
Available commands:
/start - Check if bot is alive
/help - Show this help message
/settings - Show and edit bot settings (Admin only)
/setadmin - Grant/revoke admin privileges (Superadmin only)
/cancel - Cancel the current operation
settings_error: An error occurred while fetching settings. Please check the bot logs.
settings_empty: No settings found in the database. The bot may need to be restarted.
ask_for_new_ai_prompt: Please send the new AI Prompt.
ask_for_new_post_limit: Please send the new post limit (must be a number).
ask_for_new_gemini_model: Please select the new AI model:
ask_for_new_msg_template: Please send the new message template. Available Placeholders: {title} - The article title {summary} - The AI-generated summary {description} - The original short description {link} - The URL to the original article {topic_name} - The category/topic of the source {source_name} - The domain name of the source {date} - The date the article is posted by the bot {publish_date} - The original article publication date {publish_time} - The original article publication time Supported HTML Tags: <b>Bold</b> ‚Üí Bold <i>Italic</i> ‚Üí Italic Example: <b>{title}</b> #{topic_name} {summary} üìÖ {publish_date} at {publish_time} | üì∞ {source_name} <a href="{link}">Read More</a>
ask_for_new_schedule: Please send the new schedule interval (in minutes, e.g., 60).
ask_for_rss_max_age: Please send the new maximum age for RSS articles (in hours, e.g., 24).
ask_for_approval_chat_id: Please send the Chat ID for approval notifications. This can be a user ID or a group ID (for groups, use a negative sign, e.g., -100123456). Send 0 to default to the Superadmin's chat.
ask_for_edited_summary: Please send the new, edited summary for this post. You can copy, paste, and edit the text from the original message.
invalid_input_not_a_number: Invalid input. Please provide a number.
sources_menu_title: üì∞ News Sources Management What would you like to do?
no_sources_found: No news sources found in the database.
ask_source_type: Select the type for the new source:
ask_source_url: Please send the URL for the new source.
ask_source_selector: Please send the CSS selector for the article links.
confirm_delete_prompt: Are you sure you want to delete this source? %s
permission_denied: You do not have permission to use this command.
setadmin_success: Admin status for user %d has been updated.
setadmin_superadmin_fail: Cannot change the status of a Superadmin.
